CustomField.description: Enter the list of product fields that represent the product totaling hierarchy. Each product field name should be separated by a new line. For Ad-hoc totaling enter the line item fields which represent a totaling group. If empty then Bundle Family will be used by default.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the list of product fields that represent the product totaling hierarchy. Each product field name should be separated by a new line. For Ad-hoc totaling enter the line item fields which represent a totaling group. Default is Bundle Family.
CustomField.label: Adhoc/Product Totaling Hierarchy
